TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: Have you seen this? Our <color=lightblue>sun</color> is dying and you.. are you paired with the one of statues? Someone at <color=lightblue>Giantâ€™s Deep</color> is also paired. I wonder who or what that could be?
SOLANUM: Never mind, I forgot that you can't respond since I cannot understand your language.
SOLANUM: It appears that I am also paired now. I ended up right in front of that nearby statue when I thought about this place.
SOLANUM: I guess we're both trapped in the time loop right before the <color=lightblue>sun</color> goes supernova. It's our lucky day, huh? ...or not. Sorry.

SOLANUM: I just realized that we're running out of time. Most likely I'll be back on the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> after the loop resets according to your memories? That's how it works, right? Will see next loop!
SOLANUM: You know, I think I want to visit <color=orange>my childhood</color> places before we leave.

SOLANUM: Can we actually escape? The supernova will be really huge, but what if we just fly away from it? It should work. The warp core is charged from the last loop's supernova so we can try using it to get out of here before the <color=lightblue>sun</color> explodes again.

SOLANUM: According to your vision, <color=orange>the Vessel</color> is inside <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color>. There is a possibility that it is still working. My chances of getting there are slim, but I must at least try.
